sandy.math.Point3DMath

type
class
subclasses
sandy.math.VertexMath
version
3.1
since
0.2
Math functions for Point3D manipulations.

Static Variables

addPoint3D(default,method) : p_oV : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> p_oW : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> sandy.core.data.Point3D

Adds two 3D vectors.

clone(default,method) : p_oV : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> sandy.core.data.Point3D

Clones a 3D Point3D.

cross(default,method) : p_oW : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> p_oV : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> sandy.core.data.Point3D

Computes the cross product of two 3D vectors.

distance(default,method) : pA : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> pB : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> Float

Returns the distance between two Point3Ds

distanceSquared(default,method) : pA : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> pB : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> Float

Returns the distance squared between two Point3Ds. This method avoids the overhead of a Math.sqrt() call.

dot(default,method) : p_oV : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> p_oW : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> Float

Computes the dot product the two 3D vectors.

getAngle(default,method) : p_oV : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> p_oW : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> Float

Calculates the angle between two 3D vectors.

getNorm(inline,null) : p_oV : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> Float

Computes the norm of a 3D Point3D.

negate(default,method) : p_oV : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> sandy.core.data.Point3D

Computes the oposite Point3D of a specified 3D Point3D.

normalize(inline,null) : p_oV : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> Bool

Normalizes a 3d Point3D.

pow(default,method) : p_oV : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> p_nExp : Float -> sandy.core.data.Point3D

Computes the power of a 3D Point3D.

Here the meaning of the power of a Point3D is a new Point3D
where each element is the the n:th power of the corresponding element.

Ex: A^n = ( A.x^n, A.y^n, A.z^n )

scale(default,method) : p_oV : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> n : Float -> sandy.core.data.Point3D

Multiplies a 3D Point3D by specified scalar.

sphrand(default,method) : inner : Float -> outer : Float -> sandy.core.data.Point3D

Returns a random Point3D contained betweeen the first and second values

sub(default,method) : p_oV : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> p_oW : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> sandy.core.data.Point3D

Substracts one 3D Point3D from another
